SELECT wsc.id, wsc.storehouse_id storehuoseId, wsc.customer_id customerId, wsc.commodity_id commodityId, wcbi.customer_name customerName, wcbi.customer_code customerCode, wcs.bar_code barCode, wcs.sku_name skuName, wcs.spec spec, wcs.model_no modelNo, wcs.single_unit singleUnit, wsi.store_code storeCode, wsi.house_code houseCode, wdi.dict_name houseName, wsc.store_nums storeNums, wsc.available_nums availableNums, wsc.lock_nums lockNums FROM wms_storehouse_config wsc LEFT JOIN wms_storehouse_info wsi ON wsi.id = wsc.storehouse_id LEFT JOIN wms_dict_info wdi ON wdi.dict_code = wsi.house_code LEFT JOIN wms_customer_base_info wcbi ON wcbi.id = wsc.customer_id LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_info wci ON wci.id = wsc.commodity_id LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_sku wcs ON wci.commodity_code = wcs.bar_code

SELECT wsc.id, wsc.state, wsc.customer_id customerId, wsc.store_nums storeNums, wsc.available_nums availabelNums, wcs.sku_name skuName, wcs.bar_code commodityCode, wsi.id storehouseId, wsi.house_code houseCode, wsi.store_code storeCode, wcbi.customer_code customerCode, wcbi.customer_name customerName, wci.id commodityId FROM wms_storehouse_config wsc LEFT JOIN wms_storehouse_info wsi ON wsi.id = wsc.storehouse_id LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_info wci ON wsc.commodity_id = wci.id LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_sku wcs ON wcs.bar_code = wci.commodity_code LEFT JOIN wms_customer_base_info wcbi ON wcbi.id = wsc.customer_id
